Description: Identify when a user has received a phishing email, clicked on a URL within it, and subsequently performed a successful sign-in from a location that hasn't been seen before for the user in the last 5 days.
DisplayName: Correlation: Phish Delivered Followed by an Anomalous Sign-In
Name: c0c89a84-fdff-4ed4-a443-405ad0af56ef
Query:
let ZappedEmail = EmailPostDeliveryEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | where ActionType == "Spam ZAP" or ActionType == "Phish ZAP"
    | distinct NetworkMessageId;
let PhishEmail = EmailEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | where ThreatTypes == "Phish"
    | distinct NetworkMessageId;
let PhishEntity = PhishEmail
    | union ZappedEmail;
let PhishEmailURLClick = UrlClickEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | join kind=inner PhishEntity on NetworkMessageId
    | project ClickedURL= Url, PhishEmailNID=NetworkMessageId;
let PhishEmailDetails = EmailEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | join kind=inner PhishEmailURLClick on $left.NetworkMessageId == $right.PhishEmailNID
    | project-away NetworkMessageId
    | where not(OrgLevelPolicy contains "Phishing Simulation")
    | where not(OrgLevelPolicy contains "Sender address list (Safe sender / Blocked sender)")
    | where not(UserLevelPolicy contains "Sender address list (Safe sender / Blocked sender)")
    | where not(SenderFromAddress contains "knowbe4")
    | where not(SenderFromDomain contains "knowbe4")
    | where not(InternetMessageId contains "knowbe4")
    | where SenderFromAddress !in ("dse@eumail.docusign.net","dse_na2@docusign.net","dse_na3@docusign.net")
    | extend EmailDeliveryTime = TimeGenerated
    | join kind=leftouter EmailAttachmentInfo on $left.PhishEmailNID == $right.NetworkMessageId
    | join kind=leftouter EmailPostDeliveryEvents on $left.PhishEmailNID == $right.NetworkMessageId
    | summarize Attachments = make_set(FileName), ClickedURLs = make_set(ClickedURL)
        by
        EmailDeliveryTime,
        SenderFromAddress,
        RecipientEmailAddress,
        PhishEmailNID,
        Subject,
        UrlCount,
        SenderIPv4,
        ConfidenceLevel,
        ThreatTypes,
        ActionType
    | extend PhishingEmailDetails = strcat(
                                    "Email received: ",
                                    tostring(EmailDeliveryTime), 
                                    "\n Email subject: ",
                                    tostring(Subject), 
                                    "\n Email Network Message ID: ",
                                    tostring(PhishEmailNID),
                                    "\n Email Recipient: ",
                                    tostring(RecipientEmailAddress), 
                                    "\n Email sender: ",
                                    tostring(SenderFromAddress),
                                    "\n Sender's IP: ",
                                    tostring(SenderIPv4),
                                    "\n URLs count: ",
                                    tostring(UrlCount),
                                    "\n Clicked URLs: ",
                                    tostring(ClickedURLs),
                                    "\n Attachments: ",
                                    tostring(Attachments),
                                    "\n Confidence level: ",
                                    tostring(ConfidenceLevel),
                                    "\n Threat Type: ",
                                    tostring(ThreatTypes),
                                    "\n ZAP Type: ",
                                    tostring(ActionType)
                                );
let KnownLocations = SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated between(ago(14d) .. ago(1h)) // ADJUST SECOND PARAMETER DEPENEDING ON RULE FREQUENCY
    | where ResultType == 0
    | extend LocationDetail = strcat(Location, "-", LocationDetails.state)
    | summarize UserKnownLocation = make_set(LocationDetail) by UserPrincipalName;
let IPManagedAttempts = SigninLogs
    | union AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | where (tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail_dynamic).trustType) != "" or tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail_string).trustType) != "") or (DeviceDetail_dynamic or DeviceDetail_string contains "PII Removed")
    | distinct IPAddress;
let AnomalousSignIn = SigninLogs
    | join kind=leftouter KnownLocations on UserPrincipalName
    | join kind=inner PhishEmailDetails on $left.UserPrincipalName == $right.RecipientEmailAddress
    | where ResultType == 0
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) // CHANGE IT DEPENDING ON RULE FREQUENCY
    | where tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType) == ""
    | extend AnomalousLocationDetail = strcat(Location, "-", LocationDetails.state)
    | where not(UserKnownLocation has (AnomalousLocationDetail))
    | extend AnomalousSignInTime = TimeGenerated;
AnomalousSignIn
| extend AnomalousSignInTime = format_datetime(AnomalousSignInTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH')
| project
    AnomalousSignInTime,
    UserPrincipalName,
    AnomalousLocationDetail,
    UserKnownLocation,
    DeviceDetail,
    AppDisplayName,
    Status,
    AuthenticationRequirement,
    IPAddress,
    PhishingEmailDetails,
    RiskEventTypes,
    RiskEventTypes_V2
| summarize
    AnomalousLocationLatestSignin = arg_max(AnomalousSignInTime, *),
    UserKnownLocations = make_set(UserKnownLocation), 
    UsedDevices = make_set(DeviceDetail),
    UsedApps = make_set(AppDisplayName),
    SigninStatuses = make_set(Status),
    AuthRequirements = make_set(AuthenticationRequirement),
    PhishEmailsCustomEntity = make_set(PhishingEmailDetails),
    RiskEventV1 = make_set(RiskEventTypes),
    RiskEventV2= make_set(RiskEventTypes_V2)
    by UserPrincipalName, AnomalousLocationDetail, AnomalousIP = IPAddress
| project-away
    AuthenticationRequirement,
    Status,
    AppDisplayName,
    DeviceDetail,
    UserKnownLocation,
    PhishingEmailDetails
| join kind=leftanti IPManagedAttempts on $left.AnomalousIP == $right.IPAddress
